channel.title: I know I sound like a complete dumbass but
channel.description: I recently download a source which came with a client... When I click run.bat the .bat file comes up then closes quickly and no client shows. I think it has something to do with the cache though. I have the client's cache. I just need to know where to put it on my computer? Sorry, I know I sound stupid but it's been awhile since I have played with rsps's. Please help, it is greatly appreciated!

item.title: I know I sound like a complete dumbass but
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

xjadefighter:

You put the cache in your :c drive

That’s only for clients that have a cache downloader.

I’m happy you solved this.
If you ever have a run.bat that does that right click it and press edit.
at the bottom of the code there is usually the word exit.
replace that with pause. the file won’t close again till you tell it to.

Read full topic
